Interface ResourceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TSSGResourceInstanceManager, TSSGResourceManager, TSSGVctManager

    public interface ResourceManager

      • addResource

        Integer addResource(Resource resource,
                  String resSource,
                  String cfgSource)
                    throws RepositoryException
        Add a resource to the repo. The String parameters should contain Java source code for this resource. These two source files can be generated for instance using ResourceManager.generateSources() (currently done in the portal).
        Returns:
        the integer id of the resource
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • setResource

        void setResource(Resource resource)
                 throws RepositoryException
        Modifies an existing resource.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • removeResource

                    throws RepositoryException
        Removes the resource with the given name from the repository.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException

      • isUsed

               throws RepositoryException
        Throws:
